channel.title: Thoughts on Dan Oved's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Thoughts on Dan Oved's Blog

item.title: Finally fulfilling a ten-year-old goal of starting a blog and posting something.
item.description: Today was the final day of orientation for ITP. Thanks goes out to the residents for giving us great workshops on creating documentation and how to create a blog, then forcing us do it. I’ve been wanting to since I started coding, but each time my fear of public writing has turned into infinite procrastination. One of the biggest takeaways from this talk is that even if you build something amazing, if no one sees and learns from it, then it’s pretty wasteful.
